## QueryTypes.set() method

Set the types to use to filter a query by type.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(value: string | string[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | <code>string &#124; string[]</code> | A string or an array of strings representing types. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
